Setup.DropHeader: <!-- Metadata --> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"> <meta name="robots" content="index,follow,noodp,noydir"> <meta name="generator" content="%AppName% %AppVersion% (build %BuildVersion%)"> <meta name="description" content="%Description%"> <meta name="keywords" content="%Keywords%"> <meta name="referrer" content="always"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1"> <meta name="HandheldFriendly" content="True"> <meta name="MobileOptimized" content="336"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=2.0, user-scalable=yes"> <meta name="application-name" content="%SiteTitle%"> <meta name="msapplication-starturl" content="%PageURL%"> <meta name="msapplication-tooltip" content="%Description%"> <meta name="msapplication-window" content="width=1024;height=768"> <link href="%Favicon%" rel="shortcut icon"> %FeedLink% <title>%PageTitle% - %SiteTitle%</title>
